wooohooo! Im like that too...we have a resort here in southern az but no clothes on + very hot hot hot sun = blisters and lobster color and pain and all kinds of stuff.  My son is a lil nudist too lol I have to remind him to put clothes on all the time lol...but as soon as he isnt here off come  mine haha

purplespacefriend <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:          Yep! Me and wife were actually members of Mountain Aire Ranch here 
in Colorado for like ten years--just don't like to wear clothes. 

Frank-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Rhonda W <rhondak1973@...> wrote:
>
> Alright Frank ...were you recording this one while in the nude!!?? 
LOL Great recordings! Its amazing even with foreign language they 
are able to use it and pick out and transmit the words and stuff in 
the English language.
> 
> Rhonda
> 
> Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:

tonight. I tune in a shortwave station, announce I'm doing an EVP 
recording, and start recording for maybe five minutes. 
> 
> Frank-S
